name: 林信標
objective:
1.無線通訊系統簡介
2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹
3.無線電通訊的傳播原理
4.行動通訊之調變技術
5.行動通訊之多工技術
6.天線?多元性與系統分析
7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼
8.無線網路系統
9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
schedule:
1 week　　Introduction of Cellular Concepts
2 weeks　　Overview on Digital Communications
2 weeks　　Mobile Radio Propagation Properties
2 weeks　　TDMA Technologies and Systems
2 weeks　　CDMA Technologies and Systems
1 week　　Basic Principle of OFDM Technologies
1 week　　OFDM Transmission in Wireless Channel
1 week　　Impairments of OFDM Technologies
1 week　　Synchronization and Channel Estimation of OFDM Systems
2 weeks　　OFDM Applications
2 weeks　　期末報告
scorePolicy:
•　　Test (30%)
–　　是非 選擇 簡答
–　　課堂上提過之基本概念
•　　期末報告 (70%) 
–　　主題須與行動通訊技術相關
–　　須至少有兩篇參考文獻(請盡量勿選中文文獻資料)
–　　期末需準備約25分鐘之口頭報告
–　　第十八週結束前需繳交報告投影片(ppt 檔), 以及10-20頁之報告(doc 檔)
materials:
Reference books:
1.　　A. F. Molisch, “Wireless Communication”, 2011, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd
2.     T.S. Rappaport, “Wireless Communications”, 1996, Prentice Hall.
3.　　S.R. Saunders, “Antennas and Propagation for Wireless Communication Systems”, 1999, John Willey & Sons, LTD.
4.　　D.P. Agrawal, “Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems”, 2003, Thomson Learning, Inc.
